entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the water. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 7:09 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the water early in the morning. Wind becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 7:09 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing late in the evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 7:09 PM PST Friday 06 January 2023
